description: Patient ID (format: number #####Â or, from September 2021, C-######)
Patient's age (in years; NA: not recorded)
Patient's sex (M: male; F: female; NA: not recorded)
ID of the trial cluster to which the patient was allocated based on their address (number from 1 to 16)
Rapid diagnostic test (RDT) / confirmation status of the patient (FALSE: negative RDT result; TRUE: posititve RDT result; NA: not tested)
Treatment outcome, with the following categories:
- left before discharged (did not receive treatment)
- death on arrival (prior to receiving treatment)

Whether time of admission is during the trial intervention period (TRUE: from July 2019 until 2021, as household and community taps were installed or rehabilitated; FALSE: from January 2017 until June 2019).
- ctc: cholera treatment centre of the General Hospital
- ctu: cholera treatment unit of the Kalundu Health Centre (operated since July 2019)
